injectables.name: HttpLoadingService

methods.name: init
methods.rawdescription: HttpLoadingService needs a subject to tell the next loading status.
methods.description: HttpLoadingService needs a subject to tell the next loading status.

jsdoctags.comment: The subject who tells the loading status.

methods.name: subscribe
methods.description:
You have to subscribe the httpLoadingStatus$ in application to set custom loading behaviors through the method.

`app.component.ts`
```ts
constructor(private loading: HttpLoadingService){}
ngOnInit() {
  this.loading.subscribe(status => {
    if(status){
      this.modal.show('loading...');
    }else{
      this.modal.hide();
    }
  })
}

```

jsdoctags.comment:
app.component.ts

constructor(private loading: HttpLoadingService){}
ngOnInit() {
  this.loading.subscribe(status => {
    if(status){
      this.modal.show('loading...');
    }else{
      this.modal.hide();
    }
  })
}

guards.name: NzxAuthGuardService
guards.description:
权限路由守卫服务, 具体数据格式,由NzxAntdService.hasAuth决定处理

const routes: Routes = [
{
   path: 'xxx',
   canActivate: [ NzxAuthGuardService ],
   data: { guard: 'user1', noAuthUrl: '/no-permisseion' }
},
{
   path: 'xxx',
   canActivate: [ NzxAuthGuardService ],
   data: { guard: { auth: ['user1', 'user2'], noAuthUrl: '/no-permisseion'} }}
},
{
   path: 'yyy',
   canActivate: [ NzxAuthGuardService ],
   data: { guard: ((router, injector, antdService) => of(true)) as AuthGuardType, noAuthUrl: '/no-permisseion' }
}
];

methods.name: formatDate
methods.rawdescription:
对Date的扩展，将 Date 转化为指定格式的String
月(M)、日(d)、12小时(h)、24小时(H)、分(m)、秒(s)、周(E)、季度(q) 可以用 1-2 个占位符
年(y)可以用 1-4 个占位符，毫秒(S)只能用 1 个占位符(是 1-3 位的数字)
eg:
NeKit.formatDate(new Date(), 'yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss.S') ==> 2006-07-02 08:09:04.423
NeKit.formatDate(new Date(), 'yyyy-MM-dd 星期E HH:mm:ss') ==> 2009-03-10 星期二 20:09:04
NeKit.formatDate(new Date(), 'yyyy-MM-dd 星期e hh:mm:ss') ==> 2009-03-10 星期2 08:09:04
NeKit.formatDate(new Date(), 'yyyy-MM-dd 第w周 hh:mm:ss') ==> 2009-03-10 第2周 08:09:04
NeKit.formatDate(new Date(), 'yyyy-M-d h:m:s.S') ==> 2006-7-2 8:9:4.18
methods.description: 对Date的扩展，将 Date 转化为指定格式的String 月(M)、日(d)、12小时(h)、24小时(H)、分(m)、秒(s)、周(E)、季度(q) 可以用 1-2 个占位符 年(y)可以用 1-4 个占位符，毫秒(S)只能用 1 个占位符(是 1-3 位的数字) eg: NeKit.formatDate(new Date(), 'yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss.S') ==> 2006-07-02 08:09:04.423 NeKit.formatDate(new Date(), 'yyyy-MM-dd 星期E HH:mm:ss') ==> 2009-03-10 星期二 20:09:04 NeKit.formatDate(new Date(), 'yyyy-MM-dd 星期e hh:mm:ss') ==> 2009-03-10 星期2 08:09:04 NeKit.formatDate(new Date(), 'yyyy-MM-dd 第w周 hh:mm:ss') ==> 2009-03-10 第2周 08:09:04 NeKit.formatDate(new Date(), 'yyyy-M-d h:m:s.S') ==> 2006-7-2 8:9:4.18

获取同步请求的响应结果

const myObservable = this.http.get<string>('url', { context: new HttpContext().set(SYNCED_ENABLED, true)});
const value = getAjaxValue(myObservable); // value为string类型
```

directives.name: AuthDirective
directives.description:
权限指令, 有权限渲染模板,否则渲染else模板

<button *auth="['code1', 'code2']; else notAuth">有权限时显示</button>
<button *auth="'code1'; else notAuth">有权限时显示</button>
<ng-template #notAuth>没有权限时显示</ng-template>
directives.rawdescription:
权限指令, 有权限渲染模板,否则渲染else模板
```html
<button *auth="['code1', 'code2']; else notAuth">有权限时显示</button>
<button *auth="'code1'; else notAuth">有权限时显示</button>
<ng-template #notAuth>没有权限时显示</ng-template>
```

inputsClass.name: auth
inputsClass.rawdescription: 布尔表达式，将其作为显示模板的条件进行计算。
inputsClass.description: 布尔表达式，将其作为显示模板的条件进行计算。

inputsClass.name: authElse
inputsClass.rawdescription: 当此条件表达式计算为 false 时要显示的模板。
inputsClass.description: 当此条件表达式计算为 false 时要显示的模板。

inputsClass.name: authThen
inputsClass.rawdescription: 当此条件表达式计算为 true 时要显示的模板。
inputsClass.description: 当此条件表达式计算为 true 时要显示的模板。

methodsClass.name: ngTemplateContextGuard
methodsClass.rawdescription:
为 `auth` 将要渲染的模板确保正确的上下文类型。
该方法用于向 Ivy 模板类型检查编译器发出信号，即 `auth` 结构化指令会使用特定的上下文类型渲染其模板。
methodsClass.description: 为 auth 将要渲染的模板确保正确的上下文类型。 该方法用于向 Ivy 模板类型检查编译器发出信号，即 auth 结构化指令会使用特定的上下文类型渲染其模板。

directives.name: AuthNotDirective
directives.description:
权限指令, 无权限渲染模板,否则渲染else模板

<button *auth.not="['code1', 'code2']; else hasAuth">没有有权限时显示</button>
<button *auth.not="'code1'; else hasAuth">没有有权限时显示</button>
<ng-template #hasAuth>有权限时显示</ng-template>
directives.rawdescription:
权限指令, 无权限渲染模板,否则渲染else模板
```html
<button *auth.not="['code1', 'code2']; else hasAuth">没有有权限时显示</button>
<button *auth.not="'code1'; else hasAuth">没有有权限时显示</button>
<ng-template #hasAuth>有权限时显示</ng-template>
```

directives.name: NamedTemplate
directives.description:
获取模板名称

``` html
<ng-template named="test"></ng-template>
<ng-template #test named></ng-template>
``` javascript
@Component(...)
export class TestComponent {
  @ViewChildren(NamedTemplate) list!: QueryList<NamedTemplate>;

  trace() {
    this.list.forEach(it => {
      console.log(it.named);
      console.log(it.template);
    });
  }
}

components.name: NzxBetweenComponent
components.description: 包含开始和结束两个控件，子组件使用start和end属性来插入到对应的容易内。
components.rawdescription: 包含开始和结束两个控件，子组件使用`start`和`end`属性来插入到对应的容易内。
components.templateData:
<nz-input-group
  nzCompact
  class="nzx-between"
  [class.nzx-between-disabled]="nzxDisabled || (nzxStartDisabled && nzxEndDisabled)"
  [nzSize]="nzxSize"
>
  <ng-content select="[start]"></ng-content>
  <input type="text" disabled nz-input placeholder="~" class="nzx-between-placeholder" />
  <ng-content select="[end]"></ng-content>
</nz-input-group>

components.description:
包含开始日期和结束日期两个日期控件，默认实现开始时间小于结束日期，也可以设置日期的最大值和最小值。

绑定的表单数据为 { start: Date, end: Date }，修改属start和end属性名称可以使用nzxStartReName和nzxEndReName。
components.rawdescription:
包含开始日期和结束日期两个日期控件，默认实现开始时间小于结束日期，也可以设置日期的最大值和最小值。

绑定的表单数据为 `{ start: Date, end: Date }`，修改属`start`和`end`属性名称可以使用`nzxStartReName`和`nzxEndReName`。
components.templateData:
<nzx-between
  [nzxDisabled]="nzxDisabled"
  [nzxStartDisabled]="nzxStartDisabled"
  [nzxEndDisabled]="nzxEndDisabled"
  [nzxSize]="nzxSize"
>
  <ng-container
    start
    *ngTemplateOutlet="
      typeTemplate;
      context: {
        $implicit: {
          dir: nzxStartReName,
          disabled: nzxDisabled || nzxStartDisabled,
          placeholder: nzxStartPlaceholder,
          nzSuffixIcon: nzxStartSuffixIcon,
          nzAllowClear: nzxStartAllowClear,
          nzRenderExtraFooter: nzxStartRenderExtraFooter,
          nzBackdrop: nzxStartBackdrop,
          nzAutoFocus: nzxStartAutoFocus,
          nzDateRender: nzxStartDateRender,
          nzDefaultPickerValue: nzxStartDefaultPickerValue,
          nzDisabledDate: nzxStartDisabledDate,
          nzDisabledTime: nzxStartDisabledTime,
          nzDropdownClassName: nzxStartDropdownClassName,
          nzId: nzxStartId,
          nzInputReadOnly: nzxStartInputReadOnly,
          nzLocale: nzLocale,
          nzPopupStyle: nzxStartPopupStyle,
          nzShowNow: nzxStartShowNow,
          nzShowTime: nzxStartShowTime,
          nzShowToday: nzxStartShowToday,
          nzOnOpenChange: nzxStartOnOpenChange,
          nzOnOk: nzxStartOnOk,
          nzOnCalendarChange: nzxStartOnCalendarChange,
          nzOnPanelChange: nzxStartOnPanelChange
        }
      }
    "
  ></ng-container>
  <ng-container
    end
    *ngTemplateOutlet="
      typeTemplate;
      context: {
        $implicit: {
          dir: nzxEndReName,
          disabled: nzxDisabled || nzxEndDisabled,
          placeholder: nzxEndPlaceholder,
          nzSuffixIcon: nzxEndSuffixIcon,
          nzAllowClear: nzxEndAllowClear,
          nzRenderExtraFooter: nzxEndRenderExtraFooter,
          nzBackdrop: nzxEndBackdrop,
          nzAutoFocus: nzxEndAutoFocus,
          nzDateRender: nzxEndDateRender,
          nzDefaultPickerValue: nzxEndDefaultPickerValue,
          nzDisabledDate: nzxEndDisabledDate,
          nzDisabledTime: nzxEndDisabledTime,
          nzDropdownClassName: nzxEndDropdownClassName,
          nzId: nzxEndId,
          nzInputReadOnly: nzxEndInputReadOnly,
          nzLocale: nzLocale,
          nzPopupStyle: nzxEndPopupStyle,
          nzShowNow: nzxEndShowNow,
          nzShowTime: nzxEndShowTime,
          nzShowToday: nzxEndShowToday,
          nzOnOpenChange: nzxEndOnOpenChange,
          nzOnOk: nzxEndOnOk,
          nzOnCalendarChange: nzxEndOnCalendarChange,
          nzOnPanelChange: nzxEndOnPanelChange
        }
      }
    "
  ></ng-container>
</nzx-between>

<ng-template #typeTemplate let-data>
  <nz-date-picker
    [(ngModel)]="nzxValue[data.dir]"
    (ngModelChange)="ngModelChange()"
    [nzDisabled]="data.disabled"
    [nzPlaceHolder]="data.placeholder"
    [nzSize]="nzxSize"
    [nzMode]="nzMode"
    [nzSuffixIcon]="data.nzSuffixIcon || 'calendar'"
    [nzAllowClear]="nzAllowClear || data.nzAllowClear"
    [nzRenderExtraFooter]="data.nzRenderExtraFooter"
    [nzBackdrop]="data.nzBackdrop"
    [nzAutoFocus]="data.nzAutoFocus"
    [nzDateRender]="data.nzDateRender"
    [nzDefaultPickerValue]="data.nzDefaultPickerValue"
    [nzDisabledDate]="data.nzDisabledDate"
    [nzDisabledTime]="data.nzDisabledTime"
    [nzDropdownClassName]="data.nzDropdownClassName"
    [nzFormat]="nzFormat"
    [nzId]="data.nzId"
    [nzInputReadOnly]="data.nzInputReadOnly"
    [nzLocale]="nzLocale"
    [nzPopupStyle]="data.nzPopupStyle"
    [nzShowNow]="data.nzShowNow"
    [nzShowTime]="data.nzShowTime || nzShowTime"
    [nzShowToday]="nzShowToday || data.nzShowToday"
    (nzOnOpenChange)="data.nzOnOpenChange.emit($event)"
    (nzOnOk)="data.nzOnOk.emit($event)"
    (nzOnCalendarChange)="data.nzOnCalendarChange.emit($event)"
    (nzOnPanelChange)="data.nzOnPanelChange.emit($event)"
  ></nz-date-picker>
</ng-template>

components.name: NzxBetweenInputComponent

inputsClass.name: nzxEndFormatter
inputsClass.rawdescription: 指定输入框展示值的格式-结束
inputsClass.description: 指定输入框展示值的格式-结束

inputsClass.name: nzxEndId
inputsClass.rawdescription: 组件内部 input 的 id 值-结束
inputsClass.description: 组件内部 input 的 id 值-结束

inputsClass.name: nzxEndStep
inputsClass.rawdescription: 每次改变步数，可以为小数-结束
inputsClass.description: 每次改变步数，可以为小数-结束

inputsClass.name: nzxStarId
inputsClass.rawdescription: 组件内部 input 的 id 值-开始
inputsClass.description: 组件内部 input 的 id 值-开始

inputsClass.name: nzxStarStep
inputsClass.rawdescription: 每次改变步数，可以为小数-开始
inputsClass.description: 每次改变步数，可以为小数-开始

inputsClass.name: nzxStartFormatter
inputsClass.rawdescription: 指定输入框展示值的格式-开始
inputsClass.description: 指定输入框展示值的格式-开始

inputsClass.name: nzxType
inputsClass.rawdescription: 控件类型, 输入框 或 数字框
inputsClass.description: 控件类型, 输入框 或 数字框

components.templateData:
<nzx-between
  [nzxDisabled]="nzxDisabled"
  [nzxStartDisabled]="nzxStartDisabled"
  [nzxEndDisabled]="nzxEndDisabled"
  [nzxSize]="nzxSize"
>
  <ng-container
    start
    *ngTemplateOutlet="
      typeTemplate;
      context: {
        $implicit: {
          dir: nzxStartReName || 'start',
          disabled: nzxDisabled || nzxStartDisabled,
          placeholder: nzxStartPlaceholder,
          step: nzxStarStep,
          id: nzxStarId,
          formatter: nzxStartFormatter,
          max: nzxStartMax,
          min: nzxStartMin
        }
      }
    "
  ></ng-container>
  <ng-container
    end
    *ngTemplateOutlet="
      typeTemplate;
      context: {
        $implicit: {
          dir: nzxEndReName || 'end',
          disabled: nzxDisabled || nzxEndDisabled,
          placeholder: nzxEndPlaceholder,
          step: nzxEndStep,
          id: nzxEndId,
          formatter: nzxEndFormatter,
          max: nzxEndMax,
          min: nzxEndMin
        }
      }
    "
  ></ng-container>
</nzx-between>

<ng-template #typeTemplate let-data>
  <ng-container [ngSwitch]="nzxType">
    <input
      *ngSwitchCase="'input'"
      nz-input
      [disabled]="data.disabled"
      [nzSize]="nzxSize"
      [(ngModel)]="nzxValue[data.dir]"
      [attr.placeholder]="data.placeholder"
      (ngModelChange)="ngModelChange()"
    />
    <nz-input-number
      *ngSwitchCase="'number'"
      [nzDisabled]="data.disabled"
      [(ngModel)]="nzxValue[data.dir]"
      [nzPlaceHolder]="data.placeholder"
      [nzSize]="nzxSize"
      [nzStep]="data.step"
      [nzPrecision]="data.precision"
      [nzId]="data.id"
      [nzFormatter]="data.formatter"
      [nzMax]="data.max"
      [nzMin]="data.min"
      (ngModelChange)="ngModelChange()"
    ></nz-input-number>
  </ng-container>
</ng-template>

components.name: NzxBetweenTimeComponent
components.templateData:
<nzx-between
  [nzxDisabled]="nzxDisabled"
  [nzxStartDisabled]="nzxStartDisabled"
  [nzxEndDisabled]="nzxEndDisabled"
  [nzxSize]="nzxSize"
>
  <ng-container
    start
    *ngTemplateOutlet="
      typeTemplate;
      context: {
        $implicit: {
          dir: nzxStartReName,
          disabled: nzxDisabled || nzxStartDisabled,
          placeholder: nzxStartPlaceholder,
          nzSuffixIcon: nzxStartSuffixIcon,
          nzBackdrop: nzxStartBackdrop,
          nzAutoFocus: nzxStartAutoFocus,
          nzId: nzxStartId,
          nzAddOn: nzxStartAddOn,
          nzAllowEmpty: nzxStartAllowEmpty,
          nzClearText: nzxStartClearText,
          nzDefaultOpenValue: nzxStartDefaultOpenValue,
          nzDisabledHours: nzxStartDisabledHours,
          nzDisabledMinutes: nzxStartDisabledMinutes,
          nzDisabledSeconds: nzxStartDisabledSeconds,
          nzHideDisabledOptions: nzxStartHideDisabledOptions,
          nzHourStep: nzxStartHourStep,
          nzMinuteStep: nzxStartMinuteStep,
          nzNowText: nzxStartNowText,
          nzOkText: nzxStartOkText,
          nzPopupClassName: nzxStartPopupClassName,
          nzSecondStep: nzxStartSecondStep,
          nzUse12Hours: nzxStartUse12Hours,
          nzOpenChange: nzxStartOpenChange
        }
      }
    "
  ></ng-container>
  <ng-container
    end
    *ngTemplateOutlet="
      typeTemplate;
      context: {
        $implicit: {
          dir: nzxEndReName,
          disabled: nzxDisabled || nzxEndDisabled,
          placeholder: nzxEndPlaceholder,
          nzSuffixIcon: nzxEndSuffixIcon,
          nzBackdrop: nzxEndBackdrop,
          nzAutoFocus: nzxEndAutoFocus,
          nzId: nzxEndId,
          nzAddOn: nzxEndAddOn,
          nzAllowEmpty: nzxEndAllowEmpty,
          nzClearText: nzxEndClearText,
          nzDefaultOpenValue: nzxEndDefaultOpenValue,
          nzDisabledHours: nzxEndDisabledHours,
          nzDisabledMinutes: nzxEndDisabledMinutes,
          nzDisabledSeconds: nzxEndDisabledSeconds,
          nzHideDisabledOptions: nzxEndHideDisabledOptions,
          nzHourStep: nzxEndHourStep,
          nzMinuteStep: nzxEndMinuteStep,
          nzNowText: nzxEndNowText,
          nzOkText: nzxEndOkText,
          nzPopupClassName: nzxEndPopupClassName,
          nzSecondStep: nzxEndSecondStep,
          nzUse12Hours: nzxEndUse12Hours,
          nzOpenChange: nzxEndOpenChange
        }
      }
    "
  ></ng-container>
</nzx-between>

<ng-template #typeTemplate let-data>
  <nz-time-picker
    [(ngModel)]="nzxValue[data.dir]"
    (ngModelChange)="ngModelChange()"
    [nzDisabled]="data.disabled"
    [nzPlaceHolder]="data.placeholder"
    [nzSize]="nzxSize"
    [nzSuffixIcon]="data.nzSuffixIcon || 'clock-circle'"
    [nzBackdrop]="data.nzBackdrop"
    [nzAutoFocus]="data.nzAutoFocus"
    [nzFormat]="nzFormat == null ? 'HH:mm:ss' : nzFormat"
    [nzId]="data.nzId"
    [nzAddOn]="data.nzAddOn"
    [nzAllowEmpty]="data.nzAllowEmpty == null ? true : data.nzAllowEmpty"
    [nzClearText]="data.nzClearText == null ? 'clear' : data.nzClearText"
    [nzDefaultOpenValue]="data.nzDefaultOpenValue || nzDefaultOpenValue"
    [nzDisabledHours]="data.nzDisabledHours"
    [nzDisabledMinutes]="data.nzDisabledMinutes"
    [nzDisabledSeconds]="data.nzDisabledSeconds"
    [nzHideDisabledOptions]="data.nzHideDisabledOptions"
    [nzHourStep]="data.nzHourStep == null ? 1 : data.nzHourStep"
    [nzMinuteStep]="data.nzMinuteStep == null ? 1 : data.nzMinuteStep"
    [nzNowText]="data.nzNowText"
    [nzOkText]="data.nzOkText"
    [nzPopupClassName]="data.nzPopupClassName"
    [nzSecondStep]="data.nzSecondStep == null ? 1 : data.nzSecondStep"
    [nzUse12Hours]="data.nzUse12Hours"
    (nzOpenChange)="data.nzOpenChange.emit($event)"
  ></nz-time-picker>
</ng-template>

variables.name: HIDE_CONTROL
HttpDefaultCodec
httpInterceptors
variables.defaultValue:
[
  { provide: HTTP_INTERCEPTORS, useClass: HttpLoadingInterceptor, multi: true },
  { provide: HTTP_INTERCEPTORS, useClass: HttpUrlInterceptor, multi: true },
  { provide: HTTP_INTERCEPTORS, useClass: HttpHeaderInterceptor, multi: true },
  { provide: HTTP_INTERCEPTORS, useClass: HttpParamsInterceptor, multi: true },
  { provide: HTTP_INTERCEPTORS, useClass: HttpCustomServerErrorInterceptor, multi: true },
  { provide: HTTP_INTERCEPTORS, useClass: HttpResponseParseInterceptor, multi: true },
  { provide: HTTP_INTERCEPTORS, useClass: HttpErrorInterceptor, multi: true }
]

page

variables.name: PIPE
variables.defaultValue:

variables.name: SelectControl
Template
WidthFormItem
variables.defaultValue:
args => {
  return {
    props: args,
    template: `
    <nz-form-item>
      <nz-form-label>label1</nz-form-label>
      <nz-form-control>
        <nzx-between  [nzxSize]="nzxSize"
          [nzxDisabled]="nzxDisabled"
          [nzxEndDisabled]="nzxEndDisabled"
          [nzxStartDisabled]="nzxStartDisabled">
            <input nz-input start placeholder="开始控件" [disabled]="nzxDisabled || nzxStartDisabled">
            <input nz-input end placeholder="结束控件" [disabled]="nzxDisabled || nzxEndDisabled">
        </nzx-between>
      </nz-form-control>
    </nz-form-item>
    `
  };
}

functions.name: getResponseUrl
functions.description: Determine an appropriate URL for the response, by checking either XMLHttpRequest.responseURL or the X-Request-URL header.

functions.name: hideControlArgType
functions.description: 隐藏指定属性的control,　属性不隐藏

functions.description: 用于校验 <ng-content></ng-content> 是否为空，自定义组件时蛮有用。

functions.name: synced
functions.description: 模板字符串函数, 构造同步请求URL

jsdoctags.comment: let value!: string; this.http.get('url', { context: new HttpContext().set(SYNCED_ENABLED, true)}).subscribe(res => (value = res)); console.log(value);
